item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Maks! I hope you find this site helpful. This is me in the oldest cinema in my hometown where I’ve been implementing first in town internet booking system from scratch. Here are my various contact details if you’d like to get in touch. i at this domain @Romulus73 github.com/romeg romeg_ul Need a Good Sysadmin/DevOps? I’m a consultant in system administration. You can hire me to build your infrastructure, implement CI/CD for admins or make monitoring for your apps.

item.title: GitLab CI runner and VirtualBox
item.description: Recently, I have been installing such configuration and discover that not a lot documentation exist in Internet. So, I write this post as summary. I think that this is also can be usefull for guys who want install GitLab runner and Virtualbox on headless server using Puppet and automate this provision as much as possible. There are some caveats that requires manual work but it is also can be easily automated.
